definition: The Hague (city in the Netherlands)/Den Haag
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: The order came from an arbitration court in the Hague. Greg Morsbach reports.
sentences.chinese: 这项判决是由海牙的一个仲裁法院定的。

sentences.english: Though born in Den Helder, I spent my childhood in The Hague5 .
sentences.chinese: 尽管我出生在登海尔德，但我的童年是在海牙度过的。

sentences.english: 1899 - The First Hague Convention is signed.
sentences.chinese: 1899年的今天，首个《海牙公约》被签署。

sentences.english: The Hague rules also govern the agencies’ accreditation.
sentences.chinese: 海牙规定也负责收养机构的资信。

sentences.english: The team will also meet with Queen Beatrix in the Hague.
sentences.chinese: 荷兰队还将在海牙受到贝娅特丽克丝女王的接见。

sentences.english: But getting more countries to sign up to The Hague Convention would probably help.
sentences.chinese: 但让更多的国家签署海牙公约也许能有所帮助。

sentences.english: Watch below the film of a high status performance by the Royal Conservatoire The Hague in the Dutch Culture Centre.
sentences.chinese: 以下是海牙皇家音乐学院精彩的音乐会表演视频。

sentences.english: 1912 - The International Opium Convention is signed at The Hague.
sentences.chinese: 1912年的今天，国际鸦片公约在海牙签署。

sentences.english: That was the day they sent Slobodan Milosevic to The Hague.
sentences.chinese: 就在这同一天，他们把米洛谢维奇送到海牙去受审。

sentences.english: The Court RULING of THE HAUGE is to be released soon on SCS.
sentences.chinese: 海牙法庭的南海裁决即将公布。

sentences.english: Ivan Vejvoda in Belgrade expects Karadzic will be sent to the Hague within days.
sentences.chinese: 韦沃达预计，卡拉季奇可能在几天内就被送往海牙。

sentences.english: The centre of Den Haag is 30 minutes away by car.
sentences.chinese: 海牙的中心距离酒店有30分钟车程。

sentences.english: The Hague Convention on Inter Country Adoptions is intended to regulate international adoptions.
sentences.chinese: 海牙公约之跨国收养试图规范国际收养行为。

sentences.english: After primary school I went to the Dalton Lyceum, also in The Hague.
sentences.chinese: 小学毕业后我去了多尔顿学府，也在海牙。

sentences.english: Rotterdam The Hague Airport is a 15-minute drive away.
sentences.chinese: 鹿特丹海牙机场距离酒店仅有15分钟车程。

sentences.english: Karadzic appeared for the first time Thursday at the U.N. Tribunal in The Hague.
sentences.chinese: 卡拉季奇星期四首次在海牙的联合国特别法庭现身。

definition: Rotterdam, port city in the Netherlands
Nürnberg or Nuremberg, town in Bavaria, Germany

pinyin: Ma3 si1 te4 li3 he4 te4

definition: Groningen, province and city in the Netherlands
Copenhagen or København, capital of Denmark
